        public boolean lock()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: Lock
        A KeepAlive function to maintain the lock. Indicates whether or not the lock could be acquired.
        Specified by:
        lock in interface Lock
        Returns:
        True if connection lock retained, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the lock can't be acquired.

        Indicate whether or not the lock still exists.
